NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
S/V NORWEGIAN QUEEN, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 25-00.70N 025-15.59W
AT 231534Z MAR. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC DELGADA, PHONE: 3512 9628 1777,
EMAIL: MRCC.DELGADA@MARINHA.PT.
